title: Process Industry Simulation Training: Learning Transfer-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic process industry concepts and teamwork understanding
context.additional_context: Blended education combining smartphone-based mobile learning platforms with offline simulation training. Learners engage in real-time collaboration and individual learning in limited technological environments, and must demonstrate practical skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Perform core operational procedures in process industries (e.g., pressure control, flow regulation) with 90% accuracy through simulation training
Reduce problem-solving time by 20% by applying role allocation and communication strategies in team-based scenarios
Recontextualize learning content into industry-applicable formats through simulation-based project reports reflecting real industrial environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
